review: There are a lot of pro's and Con's to Fire TV. Big issue for me was there is no Vudu app. I own like 75 movies on vudu. The Game are the only major plus. The remote that you can talk to , to find your movies only works for amazon not like hulu or netflix. I own a lot of streamers because I am a gadget freak  the Apple Tv Streamer I sold that because was so not worth it. I own a Roku also and I would say it is still the best Netgear also has a streamer that is very good. Visio has one that will surf the web. Witch by the way you can not surf the web with fire tv either. Its a ok buy but dont break your neck to get it. Roku has way more apps. When you call customer service I swear its like they dont care and they cant give any time table as to when anything like the vudu app will be on Fire tv.
